definition: Hezhen ethnic group of Heilongjiang province
surname He
awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)
wise/a sage
(used in given names)/variant of 哲[zhe2]
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: The fish skin paper - cut of Hezhe shows unique characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 赫哲族的鱼皮剪纸独具特色。

sentences.english: Hezhen is one of China's ethnic minorities with less population.
sentences.chinese: 赫哲族是中国的人口较少民族之一。

sentences.english: Wu often bifurcated in eight and worked with Jiang is a Fellow Hezhe culture.
sentences.chinese: 吴福常曾在八岔和同江工作过，是赫哲族文化研究员。
